entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:02 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Woodstock 07:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 3.7°C
Wind: SW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with ice pellets early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
